title: Microsoft releases Windows 11 build 22000.556, fixing bug that keeps files after reset
content:
Today is the second Tuesday of the month, and that makes it Patch Tuesday, the day that all supported Microsoft software gets updated. Along with several versions of Windows 10, there’s one version of Windows 11 that’s getting a patch today. If you’re on Windows 11 version 21H2, which is the only one that shipped,

The post Microsoft releases Windows 11 build 22000.556, fixing bug that keeps files after reset appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is updating Windows 11 to build 22000.556 today for Patch Tuesday, and as usual, it contains a bunch of important fixes.
